mapper.select: select * from item order by created_date desc limit 20

SELECT it.item_id, it.name, it.description, it.price, it.price * (t.tax_rate / 100 + 1 ) as 'tax_on_price', it.status, it.url, t.tax_rate FROM item as it
INNER JOIN tax as t ON it.tax_id = t.tax_id WHERE group_id = #{search.searchId} and name like '%${search.searchName}%'

SELECT it.item_id, it.name, it.description, it.tax_id, it.price, it.price * (t.tax_rate / 100 + 1 ) as 'tax_on_price', it.status, it.url, it.group_id, t.tax_rate FROM item as it INNER JOIN tax as t ON it.tax_id = t.tax_id WHERE name like '%${search.searchName}%' ORDER BY it.item_id ASC

SELECT it.item_id, it.name, it.description, it.tax_id, it.price, it.price * (t.tax_rate / 100 + 1 ) as 'tax_on_price', it.status, it.url, it.group_id, t.tax_rate FROM item as it
INNER JOIN tax as t ON it.tax_id = t.tax_id WHERE it.item_id = ${id}
SELECT id, item_id, url FROM item_images WHERE item_id = ${id}
SELECT order_items_id FROM order_items ORDER BY order_items_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT om.id, om.order_items_id, om.delivery_id, de.other_address, de.zip_code, de.prefecture, de.city, de.order_date, de.delivery_date, de.delivery_charge, om.total_payment FROM order_main AS om INNER JOIN delivery AS de ON de.delivery_id = om.delivery_id WHERE om.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY de.order_date DESC

SELECT oi.order_items_id, oi.item_id, oi.quantity, oi.product_total, de.order_date, de.delivery_date, i.name, i.url FROM order_main AS om INNER JOIN order_items AS oi ON oi.order_items_id = om.order_items_id INNER JOIN delivery AS de ON de.delivery_id = om.delivery_id INNER JOIN item AS i ON i.item_id = oi.item_id WHERE om.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, nickname, first_name, last_name, first_name_kana, last_name_kana, zip_code, prefecture, city, other_address, email, tell FROM customers WHERE user_id = #{customer.userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET nickname = #{customer.nickname}, first_name = #{customer.firstName}, last_name = #{customer.lastName}, first_name_kana = #{customer.firstNameKana}, last_name_kana = #{customer.lastNameKana}, zip_code = #{customer.zipCode}, prefecture = #{customer.prefecture}, city = #{customer.city}, email = #{customer.email}, tell = #{customer.tell} WHERE user_id = #{customer.userId}
